GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: force data bouncing when backend is untrusted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit 3ebaa2c13f680889c4fb9f090b243499d25017d0. For more details please see the references link.
